meanings.definition: A Japanese poem consisting of five lines with a syllable pattern of 5-7-5-7-7.
meanings.sent1: In class, we learned to write a tanka with the syllable pattern 5-7-5-7-7.
meanings.sent2: She wrote a beautiful tanka about the changing seasons.
meanings.sent3: The tanka poet chuckled as he counted the syllables in his poem.
meanings.sent4: Her tanka was a colorful painting made of words.
meanings.sent5: The tanka's structure helped her express her feelings concisely.
